title: Pixel 2 Freezing/Crashing
content:
Hey guys,

I'm having an issue where randomly my phone will freeze and I will have to hold down the power button for 10 seconds for it to reboot.

This started happening straight after I charged using a new charger cable and socket (not sure if this is at all relevant)

I have also tried using my phone whilst in safe boot mode which then gave me the same issue.
I have done a factory reset also.
If I reboot my phone I am able to use it with no obvious issues until it freezes on me again. 

Any ideas?
